description: Morgan Shades has always looked up to his neighbor Johnny Torque.  They've grown up down the street from each other and Johnny has invited Morgan over to check out his new game room.  Johnny has a sweet foosball table, a pool table, air hockey, and a big screen TV to boot.  Morgan's a little nervous.  Johnny's always been the cool dude from down the road and they're finally spending some time together.Johnny tells Morgan he's fucked everywhere in the room, except the plush, leather couch.  With a little hesitance, Morgan suggests they 'break in the couch.' Johnny's confused at first, but when Morgan's hand finds its way to Johnny's abs, he starts getting the picture!  Johnny is definitely on board for this idea.  Morgan is sucking Johnny like a cock-starved Twink getting a prize for which he's been salivating.  He's also using this opportunity to get a taste of Johnny's sweet ass.  Then it's Johnny's turn to enjoy Morgan's firm erection.  Watch him slurp with passion as Morgan thrusts in and out of his mouth.  Morgan couldn't have imagined what's next.  Johnny, the coolest kid on the block, actually wants to fuck Morgan's tight asshole!  Morgan's so happy to finally be taking a hard pounding from the dude he's looked up to as far back as he can remember.  Morgan's even letting Johnny squirt his warm load all over his face!   Enjoy!
title: Couch Potatoes
